episodes.title: My Experience in a Cult | Growing up in, and leaving the Exclusive Brethren
episodes.description:
I was born to a family who for many generations belonged to a religious cult or "exclusive sect" as some may call it, called the Exclusive Brethren. They are more recently called the Plymouth Brethren Christian Church or PBCC. This is my story of growing up on the inside, and finding my freedom in leaving.

Apologies for the small amount of images and video from inside the cult. They are extremely secretive so there is not much to be found online, and I never thought of taking photos when I was inside.

Links:
PBCC YouTube Channel: www.youtube.com/@plymouthbcc
(Take the videos you see there with a grain of salt, they are pretty much for the purpose of maintaining their public image, but you can see more of what the people are like)

Chapters:
00:00 - Intro
03:15 - Chapter 1
09:59 - Chapter 2
21:17 - Chapter 3
23:14 - Outro
